NodeJS - JSON Conversion

November 24, 2017
1

In this post, Iâ€™ll explain about converting JSON to String and from String to JSON.

Convert from JSON to String
// Get your object
var obj = {
    name: 'Sagar'
};
// convert it to string
var stringObj = JSON.stringify(obj);
console.log(typeof stringObj);
console.log(stringObj);
Convert from String to JSON
// Get your string
var personString = '{ \
    "name": "Sagar", \
    "age": 29 \
}';
// convert it to JSON
var person = JSON.parse(personString);
console.log(typeof person);
console.log(person)
